column5: I'm sorry you had to say good bye to your Mom so soon....but wait until you get to say hello again. Thinking of you....
sorry for your loss
Thanks very much everyone. Today is going to be rough.... funeral.  My family and I really appreciate the support.
Sorry for your lose Stoty... HH
My condolences to you and your family, Stoty.

that is a great way to honor your mom and her battle with a vicious disease Stoty.  In times like these, I am comforted by a prayer that reminds me of my place on this earth:  "Lord make me a channel of thy peace -- that where there is hatred, I may bring love -- that where there is wrong, I may bring the spirit of forgiveness -- that where there is discord, I may bring harmony -- that where there is error, I may bring truth -- that where there is doubt, I may bring faith -- that where there is despair, I may bring hope -- that where there are shadows, I may bring light -- that where there is sadness, I may bring joy.  Lord, grant that I may seek rather to comfort than to be comforted -- to understand, than to be understood -- to love, than to be loved.  For it is by self-forgetting that one finds. It is by forgiving that one is forgiven. It is by dying that one awakens to Eternal Life..."  Splashhopper
Thanks Splashhopper, that's a great prayer.
My condolences Stoty. Sorry for your loss.
My condolences to you and your family.  Kind regards, Sam

Sorry to hear about this. My condolences.  From what I know about you while being here, I know for a FACT that your mom raised a fine human being -- I'm sure she is smiling down (as you read this)proud of her boy, no regrets.  She lives on in you.
My condolences,many of us have been there,God Bless  Hawg Hunter
Thanks Johnny & Randy.
very sorry to hear about this, my condolences to you and your family   Peps
Sorry to hear about your loss Stoty.....She's at peace now and is watching over you..  My mom also succumbed to cancer a few years ago and it was hard on everyone.
Stoty, my sincerest condolences to you and your family. Moms are very special. Remember her. Take care of yourself.
I am very sorry to hear of your loss Stoty,and I hope that you are managing. I think that the tattoo is a very cool idea (and it's beautiful work). Warm regards, Jim
Sorry for your loss & a nice tat to remember her with very special Richard
Sorry for your loss Stoty, I just went through the same, it's a real sad time.
Sorry to hear that, I know how ya feel.
Stoty, I am so very sorry to hear this, my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family at this time.  The tattoo is a wonderful memorial.
Sad news Stoty. My condolences to you and your family
Condolences Jamie.  Many here know just how you feel. The one thing that you can smile about.. she can't give you hell for getting a tattoo !!  Keep your head up and think of all the good days..
My  most deepest condolences stoty.
Very sorry to hear that Stoty.  I can't imagine your loss right now.  My condolances to you and your family.  Cancer sucks.  Joey

Wow!!! So sorry to hear that Stoty. Thats a nasty Disease. I have lost several family members to it. So sorry to hear about your Mom bud. That cant be easy at all. Glad to hear she never let the Disease get the better of her. Seems like a strong Woman. Nice tribute to her as well. My thoughts and prayers from Family to yours bud.
I'm sorry to hear that you lost your Mom......I lost mine in 1984 on Mother's Day....it's tough no matter how and when.  Bob
May your memories give you strength, my condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss, Jamie.  Sounds like an inspiring woman, nice gesture with the tatoo.
Sorry to hear of your loss.. A fitting tribute to a fine Mother I am sure... Gone But Never Forgotten
My heart goes out to you and your family, I just lost my dad 3 months ago so I knowwhat you are going through. Remeber, she may be gone but she will always be with you and in your heart.  FLEX
My condolences.  I can't even begin to imagine how you feel.  Sorry for your loss.

my condolences Stoty: Cancer took my Mum 5 years ago. Left a gap in my life that nothing else can fill. Like your Mum, mine never gave up. We honour the memory of those who went before by how we live today.
My condolences to you and your family Jamie !
Please accept my wife's and my deepest condolences.
My condolences to you and yours.
My condolences, I lost my mother to breast cancer too when I was 17, I wouldn't wish that disease on anyone, my prayers go out to you
My condolences to you and your family Stoty, sorry to hear of your loss. Cancer is a real bugger and a tough battle.
My condolences to you and your family Stoty  The tattoo is a beautiful tribute.
My condolences to you and your family.  Tiz
Hey Stoty, I am so sorry for your loss. She must have been a true inspiration to you.  Take care my friend.
Very sorry for your loss.
My condolences.

Jamie, My mother was diagnosed in May 2008. She had a massectomy and all her treatments but now struggles with lymphodemea which makes her right arm and hand very swollen. She is managing now but it has been tough on her. She is a principal at an elementry school and just last week decided she would no longer wear her wig. She now has white curly hair. the students were shocked. If I told her I was gonna get a tattoo in her honour she'd live longer then I would 'cause she'd kill me. I grew up without a dad she she is my everything. I wish you and your family strength. Never let her love die.  Take care captain.  Blair
Sorry to hear that. I lost my Mom to cancer when I was 12. Sucks no matter how old you are. My condolences.

The world lost the best mother, friend and strongest person I know on Thursday. My mother passed away after battling breast cancer for 6 years and 364 days.  She never gave up the fight, all the way till her last breathe. She was a model human being, and a true inspiration to us all.  In her honor, I got a tattoo yesterday with the pink ribbon, her favorite saying, and her signature.    You will be dearly missed mom.
Your mother sounds like she was an inspirational lady.  Very sorry to read this, condolences to you and the rest of your family.
Very sad news indeed Stoty and sorry for your loss, Moms are real special.  Condolances from my family to yours.

Sometimes it is hard to understand why someone you love has such a hard battle before going to their rewards. I am sure the people touched by her have gained strength from her will as she battled cancer. I am sorry for your lose.  Art
Moms are hard to lose, I am sorry for your loss.  Dan
Sorry to here of your loss moms are something special for us guys it sounds like she was a great person in your life and will live on with you. Our Condolences from my family to yours.

STOTY, sorry to hear of your loss. She was obviously a special friend as well as a terrific mother. She will always be in your heart. These qualities that you admired have been passed onto you which will be expressed through you to your friends, a wife and your children. Our prayers are with you today.
Very sorry to hear about your loss Stoty
Sorry for your loss. Never easy to loose a loved one. Sounds like the kind of Mom that gave you alot of smiles.
My condolences to you and your family, Stoty. The world lost a loving mother and a strong human being but they gained an angel.  Be well.
Sorry to hear about your loss, that is a very touching tribute to your mother.
Sorry to hear of this news
So Sorry to hear of your loss.
Moms are never far from out thoughts and hearts.  Sorry to hear about your loss.  Dan O.
I am so sorry to hear of your loss. Your tribute to her is beautiful!

My condolences to you and  your family.sound like a great woman and friend Her body may be gone but her love and memories will live on in your hearts and in mind. From my family to your our Deepest condolences
My condolences to you and your family Stoty
Losing your mom is hard. Sorry for your loss.
Sorry to hear this Story. I too lost my Mom to Cancer too, there isn't a day that goes bye where I don't think of her.
Thanks everyone, much appreciated.
My condolences man
I am sorry for your loss
My condolences.
Sorry for your loss, Jamie. My deepest condolences to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family.
